ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQ math
ygData.msgSnippet: No one knows why Luclin blew up (if I m remembering right). It s part of the lore of the game we re supposed to discover.  The Vah Shir are gone, but we have
ygData.messageBody:
No one knows why Luclin blew up (if I'm remembering right). It's part
of the lore of the game we're supposed to discover. The Vah Shir are
gone, but we have the Kerrans now.

I've a feeling that another moon will be discovered though, according
to what a lot of the NPCs say.

On 4/28/05, Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> Oh cool!!
> I don't know if EQ1 will still be around then though. Plus EQ2 could be considered a parrallel universe.
> I didn't know Luclin had exploded in EQ2. Did they say the story behind why? What happened to the poor Vah Shir?
> I imagine in 25 years the game interfaces will be much more advanced. Maybe there will be EQ 1.5 or 1.9A or something. :-D
> luv,
> -Su
>
> ======= At 2005-04-28, 01:44:00 you wrote: =======
>
